p: The reason for this different behavior in our mutating SIR model is the fact that for sufficiently large mutation rate the sequence variable γ can become 1 and settle at the global extremum of the fitness landscape. Fig. 3d demonstrates this by comparing a case of small χ (blue bar), moderate χ (green) and large χ (red). Only in the last two cases, we obtain escape from the fitness maximum at γ = −1.
